### Info

code from [multiple File Upload using AngularJS and ASP.net MVC](https://www.codeproject.com/articles/Multiple-File-Upload-using-AngularJS-and-ASP-net-M)

NOTE: __ASP.Net MVC__ *Classic* - relies heavily on `System.Web` and cannot be loose-hosted in the absence of [IIS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_Information_Services) /[IIS Express](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_Information_Services#Express) - all operational alternative dictate switch to __ASP.NET Core MVC__
